native.query:
SELECT 
    s.programname AS "Program Name",
    s.name AS "Improvement Project Name",
    p.statename,
    p.districtname AS "District Name",
    p.orgname AS "Organisation Name",
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'started' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Started",
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'inProgress' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "In-Progress",
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'inProgress' AND p.evidence IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "In progress projects with evidence",
    SUM(CASE WHEN p.status = 'submitted' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Submitted"
FROM projects p
JOIN solutions s ON p.solutionid = s.solutionid
WHERE 1=1
[[AND statename = {{state_param}}]]
GROUP BY s.programname, s.name,p.statename, p.districtname, p.orgname
ORDER BY "Submitted" DESC;
